content: @WG-rustc-dev-guide :wave: wasn't able to arrive earlier to the meeting
maybe in the few minutes we have, we should discuss how to continue with these meetings :)
if we think they're worth and in particular what to do with the next one Jan 4th, that I won't be around
in particular, in my case, I'm not sure if I'd be able to lead these meetings, I don't have a lot of time and I'm being focused on other stuff
maybe if someone else wants to lead these meetings it would be great
I feel like the last few meetings have mostly been "nothing to say"
we have a fair number of people contributing and PRs are getting merged, so maybe discontinue the meetings for now?
@Joshua Nelson yeah, I'm going to cancel the recurring meetings until someone see the need for them again
